name: Jewelry Bonney

trigger.text: Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

text: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-up instead.

effect.text: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-up instead.
